description:
Megamind: The Video Game - The Blue Defender is an arcade game developed by Tantalus Media. It came out on 02-11-2010. THQ published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Megamind: The Video Game - The Blue Defender on PSP and Nintendo DS.
